code_General.connections.redis¶

Generic Backend

Silvio Weging 2023

Contains: Services for using the key-value store in redis

Attributes¶

logger

Classes¶

RedisConnection

Module Contents¶

code_General.connections.redis.logger¶
class code_General.connections.redis.RedisConnection¶
redis_instance = ''¶
addContent(key, content, expire=False)¶

Save a key and its content in redis.

Parameters:

  • key (String) – key, usually a session ID

  • content (Differs, will be set to binary here) – The stuff that should be saved

Returns:

Either “true” if it worked or an error if not

Return type:

Bool

addContentJSON(key, content, expire=False)¶

Save a key and its content in redis.

Parameters:

  • key (String) – key, usually a session ID

  • content (Differs, will be set to binary here) – The stuff that should be saved

Returns:

Either “true” if it worked or an error if not

Return type:

Bool

deleteKey(key)¶

Delete key and value from redis by key.

Parameters:

key (String) – key, usually a session ID

Returns:

flag to show if it worked or not

Return type:

Bool

retrieveContent(key, deleteOrNot=False)¶

Retrieve content from redis by key. WARNING: This is not secure! It would be better to use JSON

Parameters:

  • key (String) – key, usually a session ID

  • deleteOrNot (Bool) – Decides if the key:content pair should be deleted after retrieval

Returns:

content

Return type:

Differs, not binary

retrieveContentJSON(key, deleteOrNot=False)¶

Retrieve content from redis by key.

Parameters:

  • key (String) – key, usually a session ID

  • deleteOrNot (Bool) – Decides if the key:content pair should be deleted after retrieval

Returns:

content

Return type:

Differs, not binary
